review: Fun and you can customize your heroes..although 1 game  is very long, but I rlly enjoy it.
>Saw a chest>Oh boy a chest>Opened it>Just realised that it's a chest and this is Dark Souls>Got chomped, 'You Died'>Welp, time to git gud
At first, it's kinda boring but as soon as you played it for long...IT'S VERY FUN and the views are pretty awesome. xD
